summary: Comprehensive mobile responsiveness testing completed for Minex Global crypto staking platform. All pages display correctly on mobile viewport (375x667) without horizontal scrolling. Mobile hamburger menus work correctly on both User and Admin layouts. Admin tables show card layouts on mobile. Stats cards display in 2-column grid. Touch targets are adequate (>=44px) for most interactive elements.
